table.name: Function: clean_after_rollback
table.remarks: Runs clean up tasks after the transaction of bulk operation is rolled back.

table.name: Function: move_cadastre_objects
table.remarks: Moves cadastre objects from the Bulk Operation schema to the Cadastre schema.

table.name: Function: move_other_objects
table.remarks: Moves general spatial objects other than cadastre objects from the Bulk Operation schema to the Cadastre schema. If an appropriate level and/or structure type do not exist in the Cadastre schema, this function will add them.

table.name: Function: move_spatial_units
table.remarks: Moves all spatial data from teh Bulk Operation schema to the Cadastre schema using the move_cadastre_objects and move_other_objects functions. This function is called after the bulk opearation transaction is created by the Bulk Operation application.

table.name: spatial_unit_temporary
table.remarks: Used as a staging area when loading spatial objects with the bulk operations functionality. Data in this table is validated and any field values generated (e.g. name_firstpart) prior to transferring the data into the cadastre object table. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the transation associated to the bulk operation.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: The type of object that will be uploaded.

column.name: cadastre_object_type_code
column.remarks: The type of the cadastre object. Only applicable if the type_code is cadastre_object.

column.name: name_firstpart
column.remarks: The first part of the name for the cadastre object. Only applicable if the type_code is cadastre_object.

column.name: name_lastpart
column.remarks: The last or remaining part of the name for the cadastre object. Only applicable if the type_code is cadastre_object.

column.name: geom
column.remarks: The geometry for the spaital unit.

column.name: official_area
column.remarks: The official area for the cadastre object. Only applicable if the type_code is cadastre_object.

column.name: label
column.remarks: The label to use for the spatial unit. Only applicable if the type_code IS NOT cadastre_object.
